results.title: Topical metformin 30% gel in the treatment of acne vulgaris in women, a split face, placebo-controlled study.
results.text_hl: Systemic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has demonstrated promising results in treating @DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@, while topically it was studied for @<m>DISEASE_Melanosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008548 @@@melasma@@@ and recalcitrant central centrifugal @DISEASE_Alopecia @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@cicatricial alopecia@@@.

citations.NLM: El-Komy MHM, Abdo NMK, Shamma RN, Bedair NI. Topical metformin 30% gel in the treatment of acne vulgaris in women, a split face, placebo-controlled study. Exp Dermatol. 2023 Jun 26;():. PMID: 37357907
